cohortName: [PL 380378001] Epilepsy referent concept incident cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants with >=365d prior observation
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (380378) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 380378002] Epilepsy referent concept prevalent cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (380378) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 380378003] Epilepsy/seizure disorder concept set incident cohort: First occurrence of epilepsy/seizure disorder concept set with >=365d prior observation (adding parents with additional exclusions)

[PL 380378004] Epilepsy/seizure disorder concept set incident cohort: First occurrence of epilepsy/seizure disorder concept set with >=365d prior observation (adding parents with additional exclusions - require 2nd Dx within 30 days)
[PL 380378005] Epilepsy incident cohort: First occurrence of Seizures (excludes concept that may represent a short term seizures) + descendants with >=365d prior observation
